txt.en: 'No one expected the siege to last as long as it did. We thought Sauron must soon emerge from his tower, but we were wrong. Many were the foes he sent against us, but never did he approach us directly... not until the end.' - Isildur
Learn of the many battles fought by the Great Alliance in Mordor Besieged.
